description_of_lnc: HvIPS1 plays a distinct role in the regulation of the low-affinity Pi transporters. The expression of HvIPS1 is highly correlated with the expression of HvPHT1;3 and HvPHT1;6 in the four barley genotypes tested under low-P conditions (Figs. 4 and 6), sugg
